text: ğŸš¨ Energy War Alert! ğŸš¨Former oil boss warns of price rises after Ukraine infrastructure attacks. ğŸ’¥ The destruction of Ukrainian energy infrastructure by Russia will lead to a dramatic rise in European energy prices, Andriy Kobolyev, former CEO of Ukraine's state-owned oil company, has warned. ğŸ’° If European energy markets start to believe the Russians are winning this war, it will have a dramatic negative effect on energy prices. ğŸ”¥ The recent strike on Ukraine's gas storage facilities in the west of the country caused a significant spike in European gas prices, as these facilities are still operational and used by European gas traders. ğŸ’¡ Kobolyev emphasizes that the damage being inflicted on Ukraine's energy network is far more extensive than Russian attacks in the winter of 2022-23. ğŸŒªï¸ The war on energy infrastructure must be stopped! ğŸ›‘ We need to act now to prevent a devastating impact on European energy markets and ensure a stable energy supply for all.
